snippet: Also, a video clip appears to show an American freelance journalist being held hostage in Syria, Tyler Perry signs on with Oprah Winfrey's team, and a respected Hollywood script doctor goes behind the camera.
abstract: Also, a video clip appears to show an American freelance journalist being held hostage in Syria, Tyler Perry signs on with Oprah Winfrey's team, and a respected Hollywood script doctor goes behind the camera.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Debate Moderators in Spotlight, and Testing Green Marketing
